Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummudaiya Vallamaiyile Raajaa Magizhchchiyaayirukkiraar; Ummudaiya Ratchippile Evvalavaaik Kalikoorugiraar!
2 avarudaiya Manaviruppaththinbadi Neer Avarukkuth Thandharuli, Avarudaiya Udhadugalin Vinnappaththaith Thallaadhirukkireer. (selaa.)
3 uththama Aaseervaadhangalodu Neer Avarukku Edhirkonduvandhu, Avar Sirasil Porkireedam Tharippikkireer.
4 avar Ummidaththil Aayusaikkettaar; Neer Avarukku Endrendraikkumulla Theerkkaayusai Aliththeer.
5 umadhu Ratchippinaal Avar Magimai Peridhaayirukkiradhu; Menmaiyaiyum Magaththuvaththaiyum Avarukku Arulineer.
6 avarai Niththiya Aaseervaadhangalullavaraakkukireer; Avarai Ummudaiya Samugaththin Makizhchchiyinaal Poorippaakkugireer.
7 raajaa Karththarmel Nambikkaiyaayirukkiraar; Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Dhayavinaal Asaikkappadaadhiruppaar.
8 umadhu Kai Umadhu Saththurukkalellaaraiyum Ettippidikkum; Umadhu Valadhukaram Ummaip Pagaikkiravargalaik Kandupidikkum.
9 umadhu Kobaththin Kaalaththile Avargalai Akkinich Soolaiyaakkippoduveer; Karththar Thamadhu Kobaththile Avargalai Azhippaar; Akkini Avargalaip Patchikkum.
10 avargal Kaniyai Boomiyiliraadhapadi Neer Azhiththu, Avargal Sandhadhiyai Manubuththirariliraadhapadi Ozhiyappannuveer.
11 avargal Umakku Virodhamaaip Pollaangu Ninaiththaargal; Theevinaiyai Eththanampanninaargal; Ondrum Vaaikkaamarpoyitru.
12 avargalai Ilakkaaga Vaiththu, Ummudaiya Ambugalai Naanetri Avargal Mugaththirku Nere Vidugireer.
13 karththaave, Ummudaiya Balaththile Neer Ezhundharulum; Appozhudhu Ummudaiya Vallamaiyaip Paadikkeerththanampannuvom.
